articles.description: Joel Matip damaged ankle ligaments in the first half of Liverpool's 3-1 victory over Tottenham last Thursday
articles.content:
Joel Matip will miss the rest of Liverpool's season after suffering ankle ligament damage.
The centre-back was withdrawn at half-time of Thursday's 3-1 win at Tottenham and is now set for an extende… [+2150 chars]
